articles.title: Milan Futuro is back: date and time of the match against Folgore Caratese
articles.summary: After the excellent away win against Caldiero Terme, a clear and convincing 3-0, Mr. Oddo's Milan Futuro will face Folgore Caratese first in the standings. The appointment is for Sunday 1 March 2026 at 2 pm.
